Query Roadmap by genomic coordinates

Source: R/Roadmap.R
ROADMAP.query.Rd

Query Roadmap by genomic coordinates

ROADMAP.query(
  results_path,
  gr.snp,
  keyword_query = NULL,
  limit_files = NULL,
  conda_env = "echoR",
  nThread = 4,
  verbose = T
)

Arguments

results_path

Where to store query results.
gr.snp

GRanges object of SNPs to query Roadmap with.
limit_files

Limit the number of annotation files queried (for faster testing).

See also

Other ROADMAP: ROADMAP.construct_reference(), ROADMAP.merge_and_process_grl(), ROADMAP.query_and_plot(), ROADMAP.tabix()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
data("BST1")
grl.roadmap <- ROADMAP.query(results_path="./Roadmap", gr.snp=BST1, keyword_query="placenta")
}
